data.title: Mota-Engil, SGPS, S.A
data.text: Mota-Engil, SGPS, S.A. provides construction services for public and private customers in Europe, Africa, and Latin America. It constructs infrastructure projects, including airports, railways, hydraulic facilities, ports, roads, and urban facilities; and agricultural and industrial, office and commerce, housing, public building, and silo and chimney projects, as well as provides buildings rehabilitation services. The company also collects, treats, recovers, and disposes urban solid waste; offers urban cleaning services; exploits and processes minerals; extracts gravel, sand, and crushed stone; provides human resource management services in mining; distributes electric energy; and produces electric and thermal energy. In addition, it is involved in the design and construction of social housing; marketing, management, and exploitation of technological and industrial business parks, and technological business hosting; ITS business; provision of terminal exploitation services; development, purchase, and sale of real estate; tourism, hotel, restaurant, and sports activities; trade and management of international holdings, special foundations; and construction, management, and maintenance of golf courses. Further, the company provides inspection, consulting, administrative, commercial, environmental education, and sea transport services. Additionally, it is involved in the design, construction, management, and exploitation of parking lots; exploitation and management of water systems; landscape gardening activities; rental of construction equipment; and manufacture and trade of clay goods. Furthermore, the company engages in the rail transport of goods, stainless steel works, management of other companies, and finance and consulting activities. The company was founded in 1946 and is headquartered in Porto, Portugal. Mota-Engil, SGPS, S.A. is a subsidiary of Mota Gestao E Participacoes SGPS, SA. Show More...
